TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IConfigMapPath

summary.span: 提供組態檔虛擬和實體路徑之間對應的存取。

span.span: Provides access to the mapping between configuration-file virtual and physical paths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

summary.span: 取得與特定網站相關聯的虛擬目錄名稱。

span.span: Gets the virtual-directory name associated with a specific site.
The must be unique.

returns.span: 沒有兩個網站會共用相同的識別碼。 會分辨具有相同名稱的網站。

span.span: No two sites share the same id. The distinguishes sites that have the same name.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResolveSiteArgument(string siteArgument, [out] string& siteName, [out] string& siteID) cil managed
Public Sub ResolveSiteArgument (siteArgument As String, ByRef siteName As String, ByRef siteID As String)
public: void ResolveSiteArgument(System::String ^ siteArgument, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % siteName, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::String ^ % siteID);
abstract member ResolveSiteArgument : string * * -> unit

param.name: siteArgument
param.span: 網站名稱或網站識別項。

span.span: The site name or site identifier.
The default site name.
A unique identifier for the site.

summary.span: 根據網站引數值，填入網站名稱和網站識別碼。

span.span: Populates the site name and site ID based on a site argument value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`siteArgument`是`null`，相當於預設的網站名稱，或等於預設站台識別項`siteName`和`siteID`會填入預設站台值。If `siteArgument` is `null`, is equal to the default site name, or is equal to the default site identifier, the `siteName` and `siteID` are populated with the default site values. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
